title: BlackRock's most profitable ETF is now a ‘hair away' from $100B
contentSnippet: The iShares Bitcoin Trust ETF, or IBIT, has earned BlackRock $25 million more in fees than its second-most profitable ETF and is just shy of reaching $100 billion in net assets.

title: Eliza Labs Founder on Why AI Agents Shouldn’t Manage Your Money—Yet
contentSnippet: Walters said AI agents aren’t ready to manage money, arguing their current value lies in structuring market data and executing faster trades.

title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
contentSnippet: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

title: Bitcoin Rally Fueled by Perfect Macro Storm; Ether, DOGE, BNB Surge
contentSnippet: Bitcoin's breakout suggests further upside above $130,000, but a pullback to $118,000 remain possible, Deribit's CCO said.

title: Activist investor pushes Polygon tokenomics overhaul amid POL price slump
contentSnippet: Activist investor calls for Polygon to scrap 2% inflation and launch buybacks to rescue POL’s price and restore investor confidence.

title: Altcoin prices rise as USDT dominance falls: Is ‘altseason’ here?
contentSnippet: USDT dominance dropped as a key altcoin market capitalization metric rose to $1.18 trillion, hinting that a cautiously brewing altseason could be brewing.

title: Bitcoin Mining Stocks Jump as Crypto Market Continues Historic Rally
contentSnippet: Bitcoin mining company stocks are soaring as the price of the leading cryptocurrency breaks new all-time highs.

title: FIFA's blockchain-based tickets face scrutiny from Swiss gambling regulator
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s gambling watchdog is reviewing FIFA’s “Right to Buy” NFTs, while noting no wrongdoing has been alleged.

title: Figure Gets Mixed Wall Street Debut as KBW, BofA Diverge on Outlook
contentSnippet: The newly public blockchain lender earns praise for market share in tokenized credit, but concerns remain over scaling and regulation.

title: Tether to propose board candidates for Juventus football club: Report
contentSnippet: The stablecoin issuer reportedly capitalized on its initial investments in February and April to weigh in on who should comprise the Italian football club's board.

title: MetaMask Reveals $30 Million Rewards Program Ahead of Token Drop
contentSnippet: Prominent Ethereum wallet MetaMask is gearing up to debut its own token, and will roll out a Linea-fueled rewards program in the run-up.

title: OpenAI Just Turned ChatGPT Into an App Platform
contentSnippet: ChatGPT's maker also unveiled a drag-and-drop platform for building AI agents at DevDay 2025, but the polish comes with strings attached.

title: Elon Musk's xAI Seeks 'Video Games Tutor' to Train Grok Ahead of Gaming Push
contentSnippet: Elon Musk is bullish on using AI to generate video games, and now xAI is hiring a specialist to teach its chatbot Grok how to do just that.

title: Cathie Wood's ARK Bets on Tokenization With a Stake in BlackRock-Backed Securitize
contentSnippet: The ARK Venture Fund invested around $10 million in the tokenization specialist, according to CoinDesk's calculation.

title: Bitcoin bull Paul Tudor Jones sees massive rally amid surging US deficit: Why?
contentSnippet: Billionaire Paul Tudor Jones believes US financial markets are far from bubble territory, citing fiscal imbalances as fuel for risk-on assets like Bitcoin and growth stocks.

title: Why Is Everyone Suddenly Talking About Privacy Coin Zcash Again?
contentSnippet: The coin is still down 95% from its 2016 all-time high.

title: AMD Stock Skyrockets on OpenAI Bet to Loosen Nvidia’s Grip on the AI Chip Market
contentSnippet: The chipmaker's 6 gigawatt GPU deal marks its first major victory against Nvidia's dominance, but software remains a stubborn problem.

title: Price predictions 10/6: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, DOGE, ADA, HYPE
contentSnippet: Bitcoin hit fresh highs on Monday, and several altcoins look ready to follow. If the buying pace sustains, BTC’s next stop could be $142,000.

title: FIFA World Cup Blockchain Ticketing Platform Raises Swiss Regulatory Scrutiny: Report

title: What to expect as the US government shutdown enters week two
contentSnippet: The shutdown entered its sixth day on Monday, with the SEC, CFTC and other agencies operating with restrictions and limited staff.

title: Plume Network gains SEC transfer agent status to bring TradFi onchain
contentSnippet: Plume’s SEC registration lets it manage tokenized securities under US law, a step toward merging traditional markets with blockchain infrastructure.

title: Ex-BlockFi CEO Zac Prince Returns to Crypto Spotlight to Lead Galaxy Digital’s New Banking Platform
contentSnippet: Prince's BlockFi became a symbol of crypto’s lending boom and bust, offering interest-bearing accounts, before collapsing when FTX’s failure left it short of liquidity.

title: New Rules, Better Tools: How Crypto Is Maturing Through Privacy and Regulation
contentSnippet: From enterprise privacy to stablecoin design, builders at Token2049 say crypto is becoming defined by structure, compliance, and trust.

title: ‘The Future is Embedding Myriad as a Protocol’: Co-Founder
contentSnippet: Myriad brought its vision for the future of prediction markets to the Predictify Everything symposium at Token2049.

title: Stellar Lumens Breaks Resistance as Traders Drive 3% Rally
contentSnippet: XLM climbed from $0.40 to $0.41 over a 23-hour period as corporate trading volumes tripled, signaling renewed institutional appetite for blockchain-based payment networks.

title: HBAR Advances 3% in Robust Recovery Rally Amid Market Volatility

title: PEPE Outpaces Memecoin Market as Whales Continue Accumulating

title: Filecoin Rises 2% After Breaking Through Resistance at $2.37

title: Bee Maps Raises $32M to Scale Solana-Powered Decentralized Mapping Network

title: PLUME Rises 25% as Network Registered by SEC as Transfer Agent for Tokenized Securities
